question: Investigate one example of the use of biotechnology in industry and one example in agriculture.

sample_answer.full_answer: In industry, biotechnology is used to produce a wide range of products, such as biofuels, pharmaceuticals, and enzymes for use in detergents (2 marks). In agriculture, biotechnology is used to improve crop yields, to make crops more resistant to pests and diseases, and to improve the nutritional content of food (2 marks). For example, golden rice is a genetically modified variety of rice that is rich in beta-carotene, a precursor of vitamin A (2 marks).

marking_criteria.criteria: Provides an example of the use of biotechnology in industry.
Provides an example of the use of biotechnology in agriculture.
Provides a specific example of a genetically modified organism.
